summary:
The Security Council:

Reaffirms previous resolutions and statements on Sudan, 
Reaffirms commitment to Sudan's sovereignty, unity, independence and territorial integrity.

 Notes the Secretary-General's report on Sudan and UNITAMS' activities.

1. Extends UNITAMS' mandate until 3 December 2023.
2. Requests the Secretary-General to report every 90 days on UNITAMS' mandate implementation, with the next report due by 30 August.
3. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
